title: Kaleidoscope
summaries: The Kaleidoscope is a Hardmode, post-Plantera whip that has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Empress of Light.

Like other whips, it causes <linked>minions</linked> and <linked>sentries</linked> to focus on the last-struck <linked>enemy</linked> and increases their damage against the target by 20. Uniquely, it also grants minions and sentries the ability to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> at a fixed 10% chance.
If the Kaleidoscope hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 10%.
